ygData.subject: Re: PoA bard quests plus a rant
ygData.msgSnippet: I guess that all depends what you considered balance. As it is most of you powergamers avoided necros in groups until very high levels why because we just
ygData.messageBody:
I guess that all depends what you considered balance. As it is most of you
powergamers avoided necros in groups until very high levels why because we
just don't have any good group spells until later on. Even the pets suck
during our mid level life. A melee class does it's job they are there to
keep mobs off the wizards and enchanters so they can cast there all powerful
spells. A cleric is there to keep eveyrbody healed and buff and so and so
on. This is a group oerientated game for the most part except for maybe
necros who are pretty bad in groups until late levels ( ie 44+ ). So in a
group oerientated game yes the game is pretty well balanced.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W. <Dean_Kimes@...>
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com' <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, January 27, 2000 4:16 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] PoA bard quests plus a rant


>From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
>Anyone else notice no one is mentioning anyone even remotely melee oriented
>in this? And they think the classes are balanced?
>
> Kit
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Naeeldar [mailto:jackal@...]
>Sent: Thursday, January 27, 2000 2:12 PM
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] PoA bard quests plus a rant
>
>
>From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>
>Necros are supposed to be overpowered :). Verant stated this before that
>necros would be a extremly powerful class in the end. BTW shamans can do
the
>same thing and they don't even have faction cuts or horribley hard to find
>research spells. Even a enchanter who is smart can have little to no down
>time.
>
>Naeeldar
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Ken Bachman <kbachman@...>
>To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>

>

>>

>>>
>>> From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>>>

>groups

>and
>>> solo 1 sea fury non stop...
>>>
>>> Naeeldar
>>
>>Three groups of six 50s is too much, certainly, but it does support three
>high
>>level groups. The fact that YOU can solo them non-stop simply suggests to
>me
>>(yet again, for the umpteenth time) that Necros are tremendously
unbalanced
>and
>>vastly overpowered.
>>
>>Kenross Cantorforjado, 40 songs, Innoruuk
